name: Hello Lines
description:
A collection of the best and most addictive logic puzzles,
With minimalist graphics and unique level design!

Features:
▸ More than 10000 free levels
▸ Easy to start and the most interesting puzzles
▸ Minimalist graphics, a game for all ages
▸ Play the game with your friends
▸ No time limit and even play without WIFI

More puzzles coming soon, we are now working hard on developing new challenging puzzle games.
Hello Lines will be the king of brain teasers!

Enjoy the game with your family :-)
If you have any good ideas about Hello Lines, please send us an email in the game! azhuona@gmail.com
